Trade/Device Name(s): BD Phoenix Automated Microbiology System Cefepime (0.0625-4 μg/mL)
BD Phoenix Automated Microbiology System for use with the antimicrobial agent cefepime (0.0625-4 μg/mL) - Streptococcus ID/AST or AST only Phoenix Panels
Regulation Name(s): Fully Automated Short-Term Incubation Cycle Antimicrobial Susceptibility Devices
Specimen Type(s): Pure culture of most aerobic and facultative anaerobic Gram-negative and Gram-positive bacteria of human origin
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BD Phoenix Automated Microbiology System Streptococcus ID/AST panels with cefepime for in vitro antimicrobial susceptibility testing.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for in vitro quantitative determination of antimicrobial susceptibility by minimal inhibitory concentration (MIC) of Gram-negative and Gram-positive bacterial isolates including Streptococcus, Staphylococcus, and Enterococcus, using BD Phoenix Streptococcus panels containing cefepime.
